recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Teknik Telekomunikasi, Manajemen, Sastra Cina, Informatika (Sarjana)
job_description:
1.	Handle order based on PO/BOQ and project plan, responsible on the order and shipment from China and local supplier.
2.	Manage the inventory turnover of each regional warehouse.
3.	Coordinate with headquarter team to monitor manufacture progress.
4.	Monitor imported cargo international shipment from headquarter, custom clearance, until material inbound to warehouse.
5.	Monitor local purchase order until material inbound to warehouse.
6.	Responsible for KPI ontime delivery, order planning accuracy, order closing timeliness, inventory turnover.
7.	Support project delivery implementation by ensure and enhance success equipment supply.
8. Close coordination with other internal supply chain team and understand the scope of custom clearance, warehousing, local delivery, reverse logistics, and local procurement
